mapper.select: select * from eqm ORDER BY eqm_cd
select * from eqm e join eqm_img i on e.eqm_cd = i.eqm_cd where e.eqm_nm Like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into eqm (eqm_cd, line_cd, prcs_cd, eqm_nm, eqm_ist_dt, min_temp, max_temp, chck_perd, use_yn, prcs_nm, eqm_fg) values (cre_code(#{eqmFg}), #{lineCd}, #{prcsCd}, #{eqmNm}, #{eqmIstDt}, #{minTemp}, #{maxTemp}, #{chckPerd}, #{useYN}, #{prcsNm},#{eqmFg})
insert into eqm_img (eqm_cd, prcs_cd, img_path, eqm_img) values(cre_code2(#{eqmFg}), #{prcsCd}, #{imgPath}, #{eqmImg})
mapper.update: update eqm set line_cd = #{lineCd}, prcs_cd = #{prcsCd}, eqm_nm = #{eqmNm}, eqm_ist_dt = #{eqmIstDt}, min_temp = #{minTemp}, max_temp = #{maxTemp}, chck_perd = #{chckPerd}, use_yn = #{useYN}, prcs_nm = #{prcsNm}, eqm_fg = #{eqmFg} where eqm_cd = #{eqmCd}
